title: Table of irregular verbs - Grammar - Cambridge Dictionary
text: Table of irregular verbs Grammar > Verbs > Table of irregular verbs from English Grammar Today Note that be has several irregular forms:Present: (I) am, (she, he, it) is, (you, we, they) arePast: (I, she, he, it) was, (you, we, they) were-ed form: beenbase formpast simple- /ri:d/read /red/read  from English Grammar Today Note that be has several irregular forms:Present: (I) am, (she, he, it) is, (you, we, they) arePast: (I, she, he, it) was, (you, we, they) were-ed form: beenbase formpast simple- /ri:d/read /red/read
